column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Love this place! pitchers are great size worth the money and every dish we tried was amazing! i would skip the olives and go for the calamari
column2: bacon wrapped dates and of course the wagu beef with truffles! the spicy potatoes with tomato aioli were also so good! very filling place I would stick with their recommendation and get at least 3 plates per person. overall fun atmosphere and with the heaters and tents up it wasn't cold at all
